content: ## Turn LDAP off To turn LDAP off: 1. Log in to n8n as the instance owner. 2. Select **Settings** ![Settings icon](/_images/common-icons/settings.png){.off-glb} > **LDAP**. 3. Toggle off **Enable LDAP Login**. If you turn LDAP off, n8n converts existing LDAP users to email users on their next login. The users must reset their password.
